title: Servers Buggy?
body: I've been playing some games lately and have been having tons of fun in Ascension c: but lately when I got in champ select the client was stuck on  " Retrieving Data From Server " and I can't do anything. I can see everything happening behind it fine but I can't do anything myself. Ban, pick etc. I keep disconnecting and queue and now I just can't play at all. Is this just me or is it the Riot servers? I really want to play Ascension but I can't with this buggy client...

replies.body:
Yes something is wrong with the server

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/n9F6RgnQ-client-issues-8th-apr-2016
